data.message:
Eminem doesn't want beef with me

By G

Yo Marshall, you better step back because you ain't nothing but partial when standing next to G, unlike you, I rap for free, fuck the fee, I spit out verses so fast that you won't be able to see, my lyrics will haunt you like spirits, you're going to fear it, so bad, every word will molest and touch you in places you might not like, so don't try to battle me on the mic, you don't want beef with me, I'll take you up mushroom mountain, find a tree, pull out the first stick I see, and roast Marshall like a marshmallow with a bottle of Hennessy, it's so easy I guess I'm eating for free, so don't listen to Eminem, listen to me! 😜

Fuck the fee u could get jumped for free yea buddy laugh its funny i have the money to have u killed by somebody who has nothing im passed bluffing pass the k.y. lets get ready for some intense serious ass fuccking!!!!! -eminem

Dude how are you not signed? Those indept lyrics are killer man keep it up and I'm sure suge knight might run over a deal with you.

I 'll take your head down your back and shove it, you call that rap? well its wack, smoke some crack you'll love it, and imagine dragons to spit some fire, your rhymes are tired. your verse back fired, shady is killing the game since he was hired ,when he spit on the mic millions admire, you trying to say you're better then you're another liar
Walter I see what you did there.
I honestly dont know whats more funny, the fact that this dude thinks he can rap or the fact that he calls himself "G"

When anger fuels your delusion you will be left in ruin, no one believes your shit. So stop spitting rhymes, and you'll have a day job in no time. Flipping burgers at your local shop, if that's the best you've got.
